content:
To normalize the provided profile data, I'll follow the guidelines outlined for company names, job titles, skills, locations, and dates. Let's proceed with the normalization process:

### Input Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "VP of Eng.",
  "location": "SF Bay Area",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React.js",
    "Proj. Mgmt"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc",
      "title": "VP, Engineering",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "March 2018",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, CA"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Sr. Software Eng.",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "June 2015",
        "end_date": "February 2018",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco Bay Area"
    }
  ]
}
```

### Normalized Profile
```json
{
  "name": "Jane Doe",
  "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
  "location": "San Francisco, California, United States",
  "key_skills": [
    "JavaScript",
    "React",
    "Project Management"
  ],
  "experience": [
    {
      "company": "Tech Solutions Inc.",
      "title": "Vice President of Engineering",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2018-03",
        "end_date": "Present",
        "date_range": "5 years 7 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    },
    {
      "company": "Innovatech",
      "title": "Senior Software Engineer",
      "duration": {
        "start_date": "2015-06",
        "end_date": "2018-02",
        "date_range": "2 years 9 months"
      },
      "location": "San Francisco, California, United States"
    }
  ],
  "normalization_notes": "Expanded 'VP' to 'Vice President'; Standardized 'SF Bay Area' to full location; Expanded 'Proj. Mgmt' to 'Project Management'; Standardized 'React.js' to 'React'."
}
```

### Explanation
- **Title**: "VP of Eng." was expanded to "Vice President of Engineering" for clarity and consistency.
- **Location**: "SF Bay Area" was standardized to "San Francisco, California, United States".
- **Key Skills**: 
  - "React.js" was standardized to "React".
  - "Proj. Mgmt" was expanded to "Project Management".
- **Experience**:
  - Company names were standardized with proper punctuation.
  - Job titles were expanded and standardized.
  - Locations were standardized to the full format.
  - Dates were converted to the ISO format (YYYY-MM).

The normalization process ensures consistency and clarity across the profile data, making it more suitable for analysis and clustering.
